title: Transcribe, translate and summarize any conversation with this advanced AI voice recorder
description: Built for recording, transcribing and translating conversations, the Focais Meet One AI voice recorder is perfect for meetings and calls. (via Cult of Mac - Apple news, rumors, reviews and how-tos)
author: Cult of Mac Deals
excerpt: Built for recording, transcribing and translating conversations, the Focais Meet One AI voice recorder is perfect for meetings and calls.
text: Daily deals This AI-powered voice recorder offers a high-tech solution for capturing, transcribing, translating and summaring long calls, meetings and classes. Photo: Cult of Mac Deals The Focais Meet One is an AI-powered device that elevates note-taking and voice recording to a new level. Designed for convenience and accuracy, the AI voice recorder combines voice recognition with advanced AI features to streamline capturing and organizing essential details from conversations. Its AI transcription feature supports more than 120 languages. This makes it an ideal tool for multilingual environments and anyone dealing with diverse clients or partners. Whether it’s a meeting, lecture or phone call, the Focais Meet One transcribes conversations accurately. It’s a perfect companion for busy professionals, students or anyone who regularly handles meetings and calls. And for a limited time, this advanced AI voice recorder is on sale for just $99.99. Focais Meet One: An advanced AI voice recorder Sure, you can use the iPhone’s Voice Memos app to make recordings. But the Focais Meet One AI is purpose-built for the job and brings advanced capabilities. For instance, the AI voice recorder’s translation functionality greatly extends its usefulness. It can bridge language barriers and make cross-lingual communication more manageable. This feature proves especially helpful for language learners or those who work across borders, allowing quick access to key information in the language of their choice. Plus, the Focais Meet One is small (measuring just 2.4 inches by 2.4 inches by 0.3 inches), lightweight (0.6 pounds) and boasts a 20-hour battery life. So you can take it anywhere and use it all day on a single charge. It’s even magnetic, so you can attach it to metal surfaces. Summarize long conversations automatically Another standout tool that sets this AI-powered voice recorder apart is its conversation-summarization feature. It can automatically condense long recordings into clear, concise summaries. That means you capture main points without needing to replay hours of audio. This makes it ideal for time-sensitive reviews or when focusing on critical information from lengthy discussions. The device syncs seamlessly with its mobile app, giving you control over transcription, translation and summaries all in one place. Save on the Focais Meet One AI-powered voice recorder The Focais Meet One voice-activated, AI-powered recorder offers a high-tech solution that brings clarity and efficiency to managing calls, meetings and classes, so you’re always ready to review the details that matter most. It’s on sale now for just $99.99, a 32% discount off the regular price of $149. Buy from: Cult of Mac Deals Prices subject to change. html:
• Daily deals

The Focais Meet One is an AI-powered device that elevates note-taking and voice recording to a new level. Designed for convenience and accuracy, the AI voice recorder combines voice recognition with advanced AI features to streamline capturing and organizing essential details from conversations.

Its AI transcription feature supports more than 120 languages. This makes it an ideal tool for multilingual environments and anyone dealing with diverse clients or partners. Whether it’s a meeting, lecture or phone call, the Focais Meet One transcribes conversations accurately.

It’s a perfect companion for busy professionals, students or anyone who regularly handles meetings and calls. And for a limited time, this advanced AI voice recorder is on sale for just $99.99.

Focais Meet One: An advanced AI voice recorder

Sure, you can use the iPhone’s Voice Memos app to make recordings. But the Focais Meet One AI is purpose-built for the job and brings advanced capabilities.

For instance, the AI voice recorder’s translation functionality greatly extends its usefulness. It can bridge language barriers and make cross-lingual communication more manageable. This feature proves especially helpful for language learners or those who work across borders, allowing quick access to key information in the language of their choice.

Plus, the Focais Meet One is small (measuring just 2.4 inches by 2.4 inches by 0.3 inches), lightweight (0.6 pounds) and boasts a 20-hour battery life. So you can take it anywhere and use it all day on a single charge. It’s even magnetic, so you can attach it to metal surfaces.

Summarize long conversations automatically

Another standout tool that sets this AI-powered voice recorder apart is its conversation-summarization feature. It can automatically condense long recordings into clear, concise summaries. That means you capture main points without needing to replay hours of audio. This makes it ideal for time-sensitive reviews or when focusing on critical information from lengthy discussions.

The device syncs seamlessly with its mobile app, giving you control over transcription, translation and summaries all in one place.

Save on the Focais Meet One AI-powered voice recorder

The Focais Meet One voice-activated, AI-powered recorder offers a high-tech solution that brings clarity and efficiency to managing calls, meetings and classes, so you’re always ready to review the details that matter most. It’s on sale now for just $99.99, a 32% discount off the regular price of $149.

Buy from: Cult of Mac Deals
